title: Sabiqahamed
author: Sabiqahamed
content: What if I am saying you don’t have to program any codes to make a new crypto exchange of your own. Hi I am Jenifer and works at imeta Technologies here to represent our (white label crypto exchange. The software comes with a perpetual license and is provided with source code. The backend logic, front end UI and trading engine API all come under the package. You can easily build the crypto/digital asset exchange with little customization as you want. We give you the freedom you need to set up your branding in cryptocurrency exchange. We don’t add watermarks, don’t ask you for license renewal, or limit you with the default template option. Our white label cryptocurrency exchange source code is built for super people who have the vision to build the greatest crypto exchange on the planet. You can buy our ready to use template and make your own materials to go on the market. Full source code given with A-Z customer support.

comments.author: rat03gopoh
comments.body: Quote from: Sabiqahamed on December 05, 2023, 08:42:53 AMWhat if I am saying you don’t have to program any codes to make a new crypto exchange of your own. ...but you must be able to translate how our code will work, meaning you or your team has at least a developer background.Is this some kind of cloud software that Binance offers? I'dn't conclude that building an exchange is this easy without coding skills. The main concern (from a potential user's perspective) is that the team won't be able to address serious technical errors on platforms that use this kind of service.
